name: Appointment of Shri Annappa E, IPS (WB:2005) as DIG, CRPF

details.description: Appointment of Shri Annappa E, IPS (WB:2005) as Deputy Inspector General in Central Reserve Police Force (CRPF) on deputation basis for a period of five years.
details.date_of_commencement_details: Date of assumption of the charge of the post or until further orders, whichever is earlier.
